name: Owl City: The Midsummer Station tumblr
description:
Tumblr dashboard theme based off of Adam Young's album, The Midsummer Station. Works in Firefox and Chrome. #OCTMS
Follow me at http://glacier-coast.tumblr.com for updates and more themes! :)
additional_info:
V2 Updated: 6/23/12
-Notification backgrounds, easier to read
-Background works on all tumblr pages
-Dashboard/Likes/Following links are darker and easier to read

V3 Updated: 8/19/12
-Changed image hosts. This should help with some of the problems Imageshack was causing.

V4 Updated: 5/11/13
-Logo redirects back to the dashboard again.
V5 Updated: 7/17/14
-Fixed post column transparency, logo position and search box color
V6 Updated: 8/17/14
-Tumblr update fix
V7 Updated: 11/1/14
-New tumblr header capability
V7.00000000001 Updated: 1/8/15
-Removed bg color for icon scrolling
There should be a button to click that updates your theme. If it does not give you that option, and you still have the old version, delete the theme and reinstall it.
